DOC.brief_summary: This multi-centre , cross-sectional , chart review study investigate cholesterol goal attainment rate define modified NCEP-ATP III guideline define possible determinant among Korean dyslipidemic patient
DOC.brief_title: Cholesterol Goal Attainment Rate Its Associated Factors Among Dyslipidemic Patients Lipid-lowering Drug Therapy Korea
DOC.criteria: Patient dyslipidemia lipid profile result within 3 month Patient dyslipidemia without change lipid lower drug dosage 3 month lipid profile test . Patient involve study previously . Patient participate clinical study study drug within 90 day .
